item.title: Azure Devops Pipelines - Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock-frontend
item.description: I’ve been using Azure DevOps Pipelines to build our Azure Infrastructure with Terraform for nearly 9 months now and its been pretty much rock solid. However, this week all of a sudden my pipelines started failing if I ran more than 1 build at a time, and all gave this error. E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock-frontend - open (11: Resource temporarily unavailable) E: Unable to acquire the dpkg frontend lock (/var/lib/dpkg/lock-frontend), is another process using it?
